meaningMnemonic: By some <kanji>circumstance</kanji>, the thing you're using is <kanji>hinder</kanji>ing you. Usually it works, but now it's <vocabulary>out of order</vocabulary> and has a <vocabulary>malfunction</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
